text:
Has anyone else experienced this issue where theme fields are not visible? I can't figure out why I can't edit it. The JSON is pretty simple (posted in comments)

Many thanks!!

*Edit: I figured it out, it turns out menu and text fields aren't support by themes, That seems like madness to me but there you go!*

Thanks for the clarification, <@U7SL518D6>.  This way when I push updates, customers aren't getting duplicates in their account of the theme?  The new theme just gets a new version auto applied?  That's awesome!
I know this is too early to ask but do we have some themes up on the marketplace already? Curious to see what it would look like in the listing :thinking_face:
